title: My Nemesis Has Finally Gone Bankrupt - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Arrogant Characters   Bickering Couple   Business Management   Businessmen   Complex Family Relationships   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Manipulative Characters   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Rivalry   S*x Friends   Tsundere   Wealthy Characters
author: Jiàng Zi Bèi   酱子贝
description:
The nemesis that Ji Ran had been unable to stand for many years has finally gone bankrupt.

All his scoundrel friends asked him, what now?

Ji Ran laughed coldly, you still have to fucking ask him?

Of course, it’s to use this opportunity to torment, humiliate, and trample upon him.

Therefore, Ji Ran waved an arm and threw a card towards his nemesis in mad glee, saying that he’d ‘sponsor’ him.

However, the next day, he sat up in bed with a dumbfounded expression. Feeling a sore ache in his body, he recalled the bitterness of last night, as well as their ‘fight’ and the tears he’d wept...

Fuck your mom.

Motherfucker.

Qin Man, you dog, I’ll kill you!>
